## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock for the next 5 days, while accounting for demand variability and  current stock level. This order size also aligns with the vendor's available order quantities. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The player planned to purchase 0 units. This recommendation is significantly higher to address the forecasted demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.5 days (calculated based on current stock and forecasted demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 8.8 days (calculated based on the total recommended order size and forecasted demand) |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size allows for a comfortable safety stock to cover potential demand fluctuations. It also allows for the next order to be placed closer to the end of the current shelf life. |
